scripts.test: yarn run compile && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register test --recursive --reporter gitlablist-mocha
scripts.watch: yarn run compile && (babel -w src/ -d lib -s &) && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register test --recursive  --reporter min --watch
scripts.cover: yarn run compile && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --colors --reporter dot test/ --recursive
